system.description: The character has mastered jump pack assault tactics, delivering devastating attacks from above.
system.benefit: When the character makes a Charge Action whilst using a Junp Pack, their melee attack deals an extra 1d10 damage per two degrees of success on the melee attack they make at the end of their charge. Max 2d10.

specialAbilities.name: Death from Above
specialAbilities.description: When you make a Charge Action whilst using a Jump Pack, your melee attack deals an extra 1d10 damage per two degrees of success on the melee attack you make at the end of your charge (maximum 2d10).
